page.title: 05WORKING IN THE NEWQUAY AREA
page.content: The girl who serves food and drink at the{Bay Hotel}in Pentire, has worked there for 8 seasons, each from May to November. She said she likes her job because she meets different people every day. She starts work at 6pm but has time off in the afternoon. Some young people we met were on a {Youth Employment Scheme.} This scheme lasts for a year and involves various jobs every day like landscaping, gardening, putting up bus shelters and other community work. The court helps pay the wages because many young people can't find jobs. We interviewed a girl who books your holiday at the{Continental Hotel.}She has lived in Newquay for 10 years. She likes her job helping her Mum and Dad who own the hotel and employ 18 other people.
